name: everywoman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who is very typical and ordinary, with similar experiences or qualities to most people: Her image is one of an everywoman: a nice, humble, ordinary person. A high-flyer who employs a personal chef, she is anything but Everywoman. Compare
everyman
More examplesFewer examplesVoters warmed to the candidate's wife and hailed her as an "everywoman". The story is about an Everywoman who works at a supermarket and is raising her teenage daughter alone.The store's target customer is everywoman.The library is collecting the oral histories of the everyman and everywoman in military service.The actress has great box office appeal with her everywoman persona.
